sections.installation:
This plugin created by http://wordcorepress.com/

  1. Upload plugin file to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Place <?php do_shortcode('plugin_shortcode'); ?> in your templates

For basic usage

Great news:

Video tutorial is coming soon about how to use this plugin even how to use my more feature included premium plugin here
 1. When you install this plugin then you will get a menu, the menu name is awesome tabs.
 2. Add your new tab from your admin menu.
 3. Define each category into your each new tab
 4. Write the shortcode anywhere to use the awesome wordpress tab plugin. The shortcode is
 [swtp category="game"]
 Enjoy this plugin.
Demo Here- http://wordcorepress.com/plugins/sinm-nice-tab
